itemListElement.name: Privacy Laws
itemListElement.description: Laws that protect individual data rights and privacy

itemListElement.name: Access Laws
itemListElement.description: Laws that enable government or law enforcement data access

itemListElement.name: Surveillance Laws
itemListElement.description: Laws that establish surveillance infrastructure or powers

itemListElement.name: Localization Laws
itemListElement.description: Laws that require data to be stored within jurisdiction

itemListElement.name: Sector-Specific Laws
itemListElement.description: Laws regulating specific sectors (AI, telecom, finance, etc.)
